summary: This document is a brief email exchange between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel regarding follow-up questions from the FCA (likely Foreign Corrupt Practices Act or Financial Crimes Authority) concerning Jeffrey Epstein. The emails coordinate a discussion about these questions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of follow-up questions from the FCA that USANYS personnel need to discuss.

events.title: FCA Follow-up Questions on Epstein
events.description: USANYS personnel receive follow-up questions from the FCA regarding Jeffrey Epstein and coordinate a meeting to discuss them.

keyFacts: The FCA (Foreign Corrupt Practices Act or Financial Crimes Authority) had follow-up questions regarding Jeffrey Epstein as of February 2020.
U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel were coordinating to discuss these FCA questions.
The email exchange indicates ongoing investigative or regulatory scrutiny of Epstein-related matters in early 2020.
